display_long_description:
# For the best experience please update your headset to the latest software version. If any controller connectivity issues occur, please restart your headset. Internet connection speed of 20Mbps or higher is recommended.
 
Now there are two ways to stream* your favorite Xbox games like Halo Infinite, Forza Motorsport and Starfield on a massive 2D virtual display in Meta Quest:
 
**Xbox Game Pass**

Skip the install and jump into games with friends right away. With games added all the time, there’s always something new to play.
 
**Xbox Remote Play**

Stream games installed on your console remotely from your Quest.
 
*Via the Xbox app, free at the Meta Horizon Store. Cloud gaming requires high-speed Internet connection (ISP fees apply) and supported controller (sold separately). Streaming limitations apply; server availability and wait times may vary. Select regions (xbox.com/regions) and games (xbox.com/play). **Xbox Game Pass**: Subscription required (sold separately). Game library varies over time, by region, and device. Terms apply. Xbox.com/gamepass. **Xbox Remote Play**: Requires Microsoft Account with Xbox profile, and Xbox Series X|S or Xbox one console with remote features enabled. Some games and online console multiplayer require Xbox Game Pass subscription. Games, console, controller, and Game Pass subscription sold separately.
